RSE 1.0 Testing round 2
installation : eclipse-SDK-3.2.1 (M20060921-0945), cdt-3.1.1
RSE install  : RSE-SDK-1.0RC1.zip
java.runtime : 1.5.0_06-b05
os.name:     : Linux 2.4.20-8
------------------------------------------------
systemtype   : Linux (FTP-only)
targetos     : Linux 2.4.20-8
targetvm     : 1.5.0_06-b05
------------------------------------------------

To reproduce:
1) Create a new connection type of FTP-only and connect to it.
2) Select Files->My Home-> <some dir>
3) right click on the directory name and do a New->Folder
4) specify a folder name and click Finish
4) you get the NullPointerException, and the new directory is not created.
